## Plot only a region

```{r}
ft <- substr(PLZ@data$PLZ99,1,1)

plz6 <- PLZ[ft%in% "6",]
setwd(graph.path)
png("plz6.png")
plot(plz6,col="blue",border="white")
dev.off()
```


## 

```{r}
link <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Japhilko/GeoData/master/data/Deutschland_generator.csv"

generators <- read.csv(link)
```


```{r}

coordinates(generators) <- ~  lon + lat
proj4string(generators) <- proj4string(plz6)


poi2plz <- over(generators, plz6)

generators_plz6 <- generators[!is.na(poi2plz$PLZ99_N),]
```

```{r}
info <- tapply(poi2plz$PLZ99_N,poi2plz$PLZ99_N,length)
ind <- match(poi2plz$PLZ99_N,names(info))
```
